# Acme Corp – ESG Report (FY 2023)

## Executive Summary
Acme Corp reports a total carbon footprint of **9,200 tCO₂e** for FY 2023, with the majority coming from Scope 1 direct emissions. The company continues to implement energy efficiency measures and plans to engage suppliers to address Scope 3 emissions.

## Emissions Overview
| Scope | Description | Emissions (tCO₂e) |
|-------|-------------|-------------------|
| 1 | Direct emissions (Stationary combustion) | 5,000 |
| 2 | Indirect energy emissions (Purchased electricity) | 3,000 |
| 3 | Value‑chain emissions (Business travel) | 1,200 |
| **Total** | **All scopes combined** | **9,200** |

## Narrative Sections
### Emissions Overview
The emission breakdown by scope is presented in the table above. Scope 1 emissions are primarily driven by stationary combustion processes. Scope 2 emissions reflect purchased electricity consumption, while Scope 3 captures business travel and other upstream activities.
